project.title: Responsive Ecommerce Website
project.description: Discover seamless online shopping on our responsive ecommerce site, meticulously crafted with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Browse a wide range of products with ease and enjoy a smooth shopping experience on any device, whether you're on your computer, tablet, or phone.

project.title: Online Meal
project.description: Website adaptable to all the devices, with and user interactions.

project.title: Cryptocurrency landing page
project.description: Check out our Cryptocurrency landing page! We've brought a stunning Figma design to life with code that works perfectly on any device. Enjoy a beautiful and responsive experience, whether you're browsing on your computer, tablet, or phone.

project.title: ToDo List in Javascript
project.description: ToDo List website Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, this tool offers a simple yet effective solution for task management. Add, complete, and delete tasks with ease, all within a clean and intuitive interface designed to enhance productivity.

project.title: password Generator
project.description: Welcome to the Password Generator website! Built with React.js and leveraging useState, useRef, useEffect, and useCallback hooks, this tool creates strong passwords with customizable length and complexity. Utilizing functional programming to minimize code repetition, it offers a user-friendly interface for generating secure passwords effortlessly

project.title: Guess The Number Game
project.description: Welcome to 'Guess The Number Game'! A JavaScript-powered challenge where players guess a randomly generated number within a chosen range. Enjoy intuitive interface, dynamic number generation, and customizable difficulty. Test your skills, receive hints, and aim for the highest score. Play now and see if you can guess right!
